item.title: Rss Reader
item.description:
Personally I prefer reederapp. It has built-in RSS feeds, beautiful interface and sync across devices.

But if someone is looking for Open Sourcs RSS Reader that works on iOS ecosystem, then netnewswire is good option without putting lot of money before locking into RSS.
